root.name: Otomedius Excellent
root.description: OverviewOtomedius Excellent is a horizontal 2.5D shoot 'em up for the Xbox 360, developed and published by Konami. The game features a significant increase in visual quality and gameplay updates, on top of three-player online and offline multiplayer, and unlockable content.Otomedius Excellent is a spin-off of the Gradius series and features elements of the previous Gradius gamesFeaturesThe game has been increased in visual quality for HD displays along with a new soundtrackThere are nine playable characters available to play through all eight stagesSupport for three-player coop is here, both offline and over Xbox LiveTons of unlocks available and viewable in a galleryDownloadable contentInteractive anime boobsEditionsThe game was available in two versions, A standard edition for $29.99 and a special edition for $49.99. The special edition came with a 64-page art book, soundtrack disc, and a two-sided pillowcase featuring the playable characters from the game.
